detaileddescription.para: DWAX random length generate.

Holds the amount of bytes which should be generated. Used as parameter in function CsmPi_RandomGenerate.
Value 1U.
Used in DWAX_Adapter function.

Used to enable or disable functionalities in function DWAX_Adapter.
If DWAX_ADAPTER_MASTERCODE is not enabled, DWA is trasmiting to the Siren the MasterCode in order to arm the Siren by the signal bStSounderCode. If MasterCode is not generated and not stored successfully in NVRam, it should be set to 0. If DWAX_ADAPTER_MASTERCODE is enabled, DWA is trasmiting to the Siren the MasterCode in order to arm the Siren by the signal bStSounderCode.
Used in functions to check the activation of DTCs.

Used to check if some DTCs are active, and if they are active, some signals shall pe write to 0, otherwise to 1.
Value is DEM_UDS_STATUS_TF, which is 0x01U. This indicates the first bit of RTE_TYPE_Dem_EventStatusExtendedType(defines the Event Status byte). If this bit is set to 1, it represents that the test failed.
DWA arming status activation threshold. Used in DWAX_SignalHandle__bStDWAStatus function.

Represends the limit (threshold) value where the DWA armed status can change. If the signal enStDWAStatus is greater or equal to 2, DWA armed status is armed. If the signal enStDWAStatus is less than 2, DWA armed status not armed.
Value 2U.
DWAX stand heating activation threshold for GSA(Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Soll) and GFSA(Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Fond_Soll). Used in DWAX_SignalHandle__bStStandheizung function.

Represends the limit (threshold, boundary) value where bStStandheizung (climate heating status) can change. It checks if Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Soll (voltage klima for motor front) or Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Fond_Soll(voltage klima for motor rear) are less or equal than 253.
Value 253U.
DWAX stand heating activation threshold for GS(Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Status) and GFS(Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Fond_Status). Used in DWAX_SignalHandle__bStStandheizung function.

Represends the limit (threshold, boundary) value where bStStandheizung (climate heating status) can change. It checks if Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Status (FAN status) or Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Fond_Status (FAN status rear) are less or equal than 10.
Value 10U.
DWAX stand heating error activation threshold for GSA(Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Soll) and GFSA(Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Fond_Soll). Used in DWAX_SignalHandle__bStStandheizungErr function.

Represends the limit (threshold, boundary) value where bStStandheizungErr (climate heating status error) can change. It checks if Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Soll (voltage klima for motor front) or Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Fond_Soll(voltage klima for motor rear) are greater or equal than 254.
Value 254U.
DWAX stand heating error activation threshold for GS(Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Status) and GFS(Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Fond_Status). Used in DWAX_SignalHandle__bStStandheizungErr function.

Represends the limit (threshold, boundary) value where bStStandheizungErr (climate heating status error) can change. It checks if Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Status (FAN status) or Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Fond_Status (FAN status rear) are greater than 10.
Value 10U.
DWAX MasterCode incorrect value. Used in DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_NVM_RESTORED and DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_GENERATE_MASTERCODE functions.

Used for checking invalid mastercode values. If the MasterCode has 0xFFu value, a restart procedure is triggered, otherwise the MasterCode is correct.
Value 0XFFu.
DWAX MasterCode incorrect value. Used in DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_NVM_RESTORED and DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_GENERATE_MASTERCODE functions.

Used for checking invalid mastercode values. If the MasterCode has 0x00u value, a restart procedure is triggered, otherwise the MasterCode is correct.
Value 0X00u.
DWAX MasterCode maximum number of retries. Used in DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_GENERATE_MASTERCODE and DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_SAVE_MASTERCODE_VERIFY functions.

Used to represent the maximum number of retries. If it is less or equal to 2, then the MasterCode is stored succesfully in EEPROM. Otherwise, a problem occured and MasterCode shall be set to 0.
Value 2u.
CAN Mirror offset.

Offset from OSEK_Buffer_Start to RTE_Buffer_Star.
value 0x01000000UL
For SWATT testing
SWATT bypassing used for testing.
RTE Read Typedef.
Typedef used for RTE Read function pointers.
Pointer array to functions that return Std_ReturnType.

This array points to functions like Rte_Read_DWAX_WakeupSleep_s_[CAN_BUS]_Comm_Active, which provide CAN_BUS activity status.
range Std_ReturnType - see Std_Types.h values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context DWAX_CheckCANstate protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
This flag shows that the lib was initialized. (DWAX_InitVarFunc)

Allows the library's functions to run. (DWAX_TaskCyclicEvent)
range True if DWAX_InitVarFunc is called False otherwise values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context DWAX_InitVarFunc, DWAX_Stop, DWAX_TaskCyclicEvent protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
Delay counter for enAnhaengerErrSt

This variable is used for counting 50ms in order to delay the enAnhaengerErrSt signal
range uint8 values this variable will increase to 50 (maximum delay timer) unit N/A resolution N/A context DWAX_InitVarFunc, DWAX_CanMessageErrorStatusHandling_enAnhaengerErrSt protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
Structure used to store important DWAX data elements.

DWAX structure containing the state of master code, state of Nvm, random number, number of retries, indicator for CsmPi generation of random number.
range DWAX_structure_t values unit N/A resolution N/A context Task cyclic context protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
Bus states array

This array stores the bus states for each bus
For each position in array: range True if corresponding bus is active False otherwise values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context DWAX_ReadCANStates, DWAX_UpdatePduCounters, DWAX_GetKommErrorStatus protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
PDU Timeout counter array

This array stores the timer values for each PDU used for communication error status handling. The values are stored as tens of miliseconds, because the DWAX component is running cyclically at 10ms
For each position in array: range uint16 values N/A unit 10s of ms resolution N/A context DWAX_InitPduTimeoutCounters, DWAX_UpdatePduCounters, DWAX_GetKommErrorStatus protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
PDU data structures array

This array stores the information about each PDU used for communication error status handling. We map each PDU to their PDU Statuses, buses and timeout values The timeout values are calculated based on the KMatrix PDU's normal cycle time * 10ms.
range N/A values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context DWAX_InitPduTimeoutCounters, DWAX_UpdatePduCounters, DWAX_GetKommErrorStatus protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
Helper function used to start master counter procedure.

Function sends master counter for sirene on Soundere_02.
void
void
Globals N/A
reentrant No context DWAX_Adapter function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant. Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described in: The testcase shall be created to check if the master counter is stored correctly in bStSounderMasterZaehler signal. TEST_DWAX_Task__DWAX_MessageCounterProcedure
Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. This is a helper function that sends master counter for sirene on Soundere_02.

Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant. Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described on: The testcase shall be created to check the if bStDWASensorSafeLedDTCAktiv is updated accordingly. The value of the data element must be reset if none of the assigned DTCs is qualified. The value of the data element must be set to true if at least one of the assigned DTCs is qualified. Satisfies requirement

Function used to monitor the communication status to the trailer using the signal enAnhaengerErrSt. The BCM must monitor the communication status with the trailer ECU (Anhaenger_01) and must indicate this status by means of the data element enAnhaengerErrSt.

void
Globals
IpduStatus_Anhaenger_01 [in] - represents the message status for Anhaenger_01 IPdu KCAN_BUS [in] - represents the CAN used

Updates signals reponsbile for transport modus and battery reloaded suppressed status.

SubFunction handles misc signals of transmiting into and to DWAX and corresrponding modules. The ATWS-master must send the information regarding the activation / deactivation of the QRS (quick-quiescent current measuring mode) and TRM (transport mode) to the siren via the communication line.

Set the sounder code error value.

SubFunction handles misc signals of transmiting into and to DWAX and corresrponding modules. The BCM must internally generate the information that the ECU could not generate a master code for the sounder and thus the backup value used (s_SounderMasterCodeErr) and must provide it to the data element bStSGSounderCodeErr as logical information.

Function the returns the communication error status for a specific PDU

This function cyclically updates the pdu counters accordingly to the communication error status requirements. After each BUS WAKE-UP, the counters are reset. They are decrementing only if the BUS WAKE-UP is not finished (after the timeout has elapsed or when we receive a NoError pdu status).

Helper function that returns the communication status based on the state of the bus, the pdu status and the timeout timer value

This function sets the communication error status based on the requirements. While bus sleep, the communication status should be set to init value. If bus is active, if PDU status is NoError, the communication status is set to NoError, else if the timeout is not elapsed, we set it to init (bus is not fully awake), otherwise, the communication status is set to error.
reentrant No context DWAX_GetKommErrorStatus thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
boolean
isBusActive [in] - corresponding bus state
uint8
u8IPduStatus [in] - corresponding PDU status
uint16
u16PduTimeoutCounter [in] - corresponding timeout counter
uint8 - the communication error status for the PDU
Globals
Rte_StatusMask_NoError [in]
Call Sequence

briefdescription.para: Source file for DWA Sensor Sirene module.

detaileddescription.para: File used for DWA Sensor Sirene (DWAX) component to receives a master code from DWA component in order to arm the Siren. DWA Sensor Sirene is notified by DWA which sends an arm request with MasterCode.
